Just started a new campaign in Dungeon World and I&#39;m looking for a place to post some actual plays and get some critiques and constructive criticism of my GMing....specifically my use of the GM moves and the dungeon world ruleset in general.  Would this community be a good place to do that?<br /><br />Just looking to up my GM game and I&#39;m a little new to Dungeon World.  Thanks.
<div id='comment z12veleifxfjext4204ccduykyavd5zpyrw0k'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/105472060898626050077_photo.jpg'> Matt Horam</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-09-11 00:04:32 (edited: 2017-09-11 00:04:32)</cite></p>
        <p>I think that&#39;s a good idea! Post them in the Actual Play category and ask for feedback!</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z12veleifxfjext4204ccduykyavd5zpyrw0k'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102595580176380683252_photo.jpg'> Jeremy Strandberg</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-09-11 01:04:55 (edited: 2017-09-11 01:04:55)</cite></p>
        <p>If you&#39;d rather avoid wrestling with G+ formatting limitations, try making a doc in Google Drive and sharing it here. If you allow for public comments, it&#39;s a way to get more focused responses... especially if you ask questions right in the doc.</p>
</div>
